ygData.subject: Re: Level progression
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi everyone, I m new to the list. I was wondering what areas and monsters you are finding have the best exp potential?  I am a Ranger in Qeynos and basically
ygData.messageBody:
Hi everyone, I'm new to the list.

I was wondering what areas and monsters you are finding have the best exp
potential? I am a Ranger in Qeynos and basically have found that Black
Burrow or the Karana plains are about it for levels 6-9 that I can find.
Where else in the Qeynos area (or other areas) have great exp potential?

Are there other "dungeons" in the areas (I know of the aquaducks, but they
are a bit slow)?

Thanks,

Karim / Alladine



At 12:41 PM 4/15/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: Liquid Reality <reality@...>
>
>
>I've been progressing through levels at a pretty good clip, I got 3 levels
>over the weekend and picked a fourth up last night. That puts me at 11
>and half way through 12.
>
>Shads -- The friendly neighborhood (always broke) jewelsmith enchanter
>
>On Wed, 14 Apr 1999, Steve Price wrote:
>
>> From: "Steve Price" <silten@...>
>>
>> I've not been able to get online for a week or so (except email), due to
>> moving house, and I feel a bit out of touch.
>>
>> My character is still a lowly 3rd level Erudite Wizard, due to limited
>> playing time, but it has taken a lot more work than my beta character did
>> (Barby Shamen).
>>
>> How are you all finding progression? I'm in no great hurry, and I'm
>> certainly not a power player, but I get the feeling that some class/race
>> combos have a much easier time of it than others, perhaps too much for
>> balance.
>>
>> I know the hybrid classes have to earn more experience, but does anyone
know
>> any details?
>>
>> Steve
>>
>>
